trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Bel Air
There were no other sightings in Bel Air on or around February 16th 2011
Summary: Video of strange plane with weird green lighting
divs: sighting detailsthis is in response to the report titled "strange plane with green lights dropping balls of lights to ground" i think i have a video of the object you described. i've been seeing them a lot in my area for the past few months. here is a link to the video *(link moved to additional evidence section -- cms\sg) you can see the green lighting pattern best around 1:45. the craft was flying only a few hundred feet in the air and was going very slow. if you watch the video in slow motion at 1 minute 41 seconds in the video you'll see a faint ball of light dropping to the left of the aircraft. it happens rather quickly so you might have to watch it a few times to catch it.
